entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as the one who has been waiting for Harry and others. He is described as grinning.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as sprinting up the street with his siblings. He asks Hagrid where they came out.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred and George are introduced together as sprinting up the street with Ron. They express their excitement about being in Knockturn Alley.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as sprinting up the street with his siblings. He expresses his excitement about being in Knockturn Alley.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is introduced as part of the group sprinting up the street with Ron and his siblings.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is introduced as panting and worried about Harry. He mentions that Molly is frantic and coming now.

entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is mentioned by Mr Weasley as being frantic and coming to the scene.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as looking around with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is mentioned throughout the passage. He is described as being in a place where he shouldn't be.

relationships.description: Hagrid mentions that Harry and others came out of Knockturn Alley.
Ron is mentioned as sprinting up the street with his siblings, including Fred.
Ron is mentioned as sprinting up the street with his siblings, including George.
Ron is mentioned as sprinting up the street with his siblings, including Percy.
Mr Weasley mentions that Molly is frantic and coming now.
Hagrid is mentioned as knowing Ron and his siblings.
Mr Weasley expresses concern for Harry's safety.
